DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1 study design evaluate absolute bioavailability PF-04950615 subject hypercholesterolemia currently lipid-lowering therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Study PF-04950615 Subjects With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Fasting LDLC great equal 130 mg/dL two qualify screen visit . Total body weight great equal 50 kg ( 110 lb ) less equal 150 kg ( 330 lb ) Lipidlowering prescription medication , homeopath , herbal medicine , nutritional supplement . Poorly control type 1 type 2 diabetes . History cardiovascular cerebrovascular event related procedure past year . Poorly control hypertension .
